column5: Thank you to all the Bro's and Sis's who posted pic's for me. This is the result, its a cane head for one of our Bro's who lost his dog last year
Beautiful!  Thanks for sharing it  bly
That's some great stuff Jack...and I don't even walk with a limp yet!  Seriously...the recipient will be VERY pleased I'm sure, it looks very realistic.
Nice work Jack, thanks for showing the pic.
Very nice as usual Jack, I'm glad you share those with us...reminds me of my grandfather...  Maureen
Nice work as always Jack! True talent!
Very nice indeed Jack, it came out perfectly !!
Very, Very nicely done.  The recipient will appreciate and treasure the gift.
Really nice work, Jack. Thanks for taking the time to show it.
Thanks for the viewing it is always nice to see what people are up too in the Crazy season. It looks just as great as all of your other work.  Art

Hi All,  I would like to identify myself as the proud owner of Jack's beautiful carving. Just another fine example of the wonderful people on this board. I have never had the pleasure to meet Jack in person. I had sent him a PM commenting on his carvings and we got to talking about dogs. I briefly mentioned about losing our chocolate Lab Seamus just over a year ago. Next thing I know Jack says if he finds the time he might be able to come up with something. To say the least I was in awe that a man I have never met would build me a carving so my family and I could have something to remeber our family pet. My family and I will cherish Jack's carving for a very long time. Thanks's so much Jack and to OFC for allowing me to connect with such fine people.  Cheers, Jim and Family  Jim

Jim, Jack is indeed a good person who I've had the pleasure of meeting a couple of times. That carving will be a great reminder of your dog for many years to come.  Awhile back I mentioned on this board that I was in the market for some plexi-glass and right away Jack PMed me to say that he had some he wasn't using and I was more than welcome to it.  Some real decent folks hang out on this board
Yep...That's my buddie Jack for ya!...  Wadda Guy !!!  Like they say Jack...You da Man !!!

Wow !! Accolades indeed !  I just like to help people out whenever I can,and the Lab head was a good exercise for me,so I got something out of it as well.  Thank you all for your comments,you've made me feel REAL good about myself,gave me a lift just at the right time...............Winter blahs
